topic.title: Architecture for Monasca Transform and Spark

section.p: Monasca Transform is a new component in Monasca. Monasca Transform uses Spark for data aggregation. Both Monasca Transform and Spark are depicted in the example diagram below.
You can see that the Monasca components run on the Cloud Controller nodes, and the Monasca agents run on all nodes in the Mid-scale Example configuration.
